meanings.definition: A person or thing that resets.
meanings.sent1: The resetter pressed the button to start the game over.
meanings.sent2: I always rely on the resetter to fix my computer when it freezes.
meanings.sent3: The resetter accidentally reset the clock to the wrong time, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: She was like a resetter, bringing calm and order to the chaotic situation.
meanings.sent5: The resetter's job is crucial in ensuring everything runs smoothly.

meanings.definition: A device or mechanism used to reset something.
meanings.sent1: The resetter on the machine is used to clear any errors.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to keep the resetter handy in case the system crashes.
meanings.sent3: The resetter beeped loudly when it successfully reset the password.
meanings.sent4: The resetter functioned like a magic wand, fixing all the issues instantly.
meanings.sent5: Press the resetter firmly to restart the device.
